About the Company: Ad-Manum Finance Ltd is involved in providing short and medium term advances in the form of loan/hire purchase finance, bill discounting, factoring through channel/DSA business etc.The company is a non banking finance company registered under Reserve Bank of India. At present the company is mainly into financing of old and new vehicles of HCVs, LCVs, MUVs, cars and three-wheelers.As well as has a business presence in trading, education, entertainment sector viz. trading of coal, lignite, transportation, warehousing, finance, real state & leasing, packaging, flour mill, cold storage, international standard schools and institute of technology, village resort and generation of electricity by setting up a wind energy mill.
